verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Yes, Lord, yes!
To Your will and to Your way
I say, Yes, Lord, yes
I will trust You and obey.
When Your Spirit speaks to me
With my whole heart I agree,
And my answer, it is, Yes, Lord, yes.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord, I give You all the glory
For all You've given me.
You have filled my life until I overflow.
All I am is Yours to use in any way You choose.
You are Lord of all so how can I say no?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
If I never knew the fullness of living in Your will,
I would never know how rich my life could be.
So my willingness to serve
Is the least that You deserve
For the blessings You have showered over me.
